title: Descendant of Black Wall Street Says Access Is Key
itunes:title: Descendant of Black Wall Street Says Access Is Key
description:
Keewa Nurullah, Owner of Chicago children's boutique Kido, discusses supporting Black entrepreneurship and closing the opportunity gap.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
